entities.name: COMPANY
entities.description: The Company has the discretion to pay proceeds in U.S. dollars or local currency and may impose future requirements to facilitate compliance with exchange control requirements in China.

entities.name: SERVICE RECIPIENT
entities.description: The Service Recipient is involved in the process of receiving and depositing proceeds to the bank account.

entities.name: CZECH NATIONAL BANK
entities.description: The Czech National Bank (CNB) may require certain notification duties related to shares of Common Stock or dividends and the maintenance of a foreign account.

entities.name: DENMARK
entities.description: Denmark has specific regulations regarding stock options and foreign asset/account reporting.

entities.name: DANISH TAX ADMINISTRATION
entities.description: The Danish Tax Administration is responsible for receiving reports on accounts holding shares of Common Stock or cash outside Denmark.

entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation has an Amended and Restated 2007 Equity Incentive Plan which includes the grant of Restricted Stock Units (RSUs).

relationships.relationship_description: The Company requires the Service Recipient to be involved in the process of receiving and depositing proceeds to the bank account.
The Company may need to comply with notification duties imposed by the Czech National Bank regarding shares of Common Stock or dividends.
The Company informs employees about the necessity to report accounts holding shares of Common Stock or cash outside Denmark to the Danish Tax Administration.
The Company provides information about the NVIDIA Corporation's Amended and Restated 2007 Equity Incentive Plan and the grant of Restricted Stock Units (RSUs).
